title: Mini-Ep 251: Game Changer
itunes:title: Mini-Ep 251: Game Changer
itunes:subtitle: Kate has a very long week and Doree rediscovers her love of games. Then, they hear suggestions from listeners about which sports bras to wear with big jugs, a question about how to deal with acne from hats, and a recommendation for a Kate & Doree c...
description:
Kate has a very long week and Doree rediscovers her love of games. Then, they hear suggestions from listeners about which sports bras to wear with big jugs, a question about how to deal with acne from hats, and a recommendation for a Kate & Doree crossover product.


  • To leave a voicemail or text for a future episode, reach them at 781-591-0390. You can also email the podcast at forever35podcast@gmail.com.
  • Visit forever35podcast.com for links to everything they mention on the show.
  • Follow the podcast on Twitter (@Forever35Pod) and Instagram (@Forever35Podcast) and join the Forever35 Facebook Group (Password: Serums). 
  • Sign up for the newsletter! At forever35podcast.com/newsletter
